column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Common Bond is a great place to grab your laptop and a cup of coffee-oh and perhaps be talked into one of their AMAZING snacks they have prepared. When you get tired of Starbucks and want a fun
column3: and delicious place to work then head here.  Their pastries are out of this world-sinful cookies
column5: and breads that you would disown your grandmother for.
